attributes.action: urge the United States Government NOT to place missiles in Poland.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When the Societ Union attempted to place missiles in Cuba the United States reacted by threatening to start a nuclear war.  How do you expect Russia to react to missiles on its borders? Would like to believe that Great Britain could make the US see sense.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
